plasma.title: Plasma introduction
plasma.intro: Plasma is a second layer scalability solution proposed by Ethereum Foundation. Inspired by Lightening Network, it uses child chains reporting to root chains (i.e. Ethereum) to increase transaction throughput without sacrificing the safety. It theoretically empowers Ethereum blockchain to handle billions of computations per second.
plasma.addition:
* Language: 漢語 / Mandarin Chinese
* Audience: Interested or experienced in blockchain (especially Ethereum)
* Difficulty: Skilled / 中階

徐粲翔.speaker: 徐粲翔
徐粲翔.name: 徐粲翔
徐粲翔.intro: I graduated from National Taiwan University for both bachelor and master degree. After graduation, I started to participate in Ethereum project. Now, I'm a Plasma contributor.
